Clinique Take the Day Off Cleansing Balm (2020 formulation)

Brand: Clinique

Category: Makeup Remover

Ingredients: ETHYLHEXYL PALMITATE, CARTHAMUS TINCTORIUS (SAFFLOWER) SEED OIL, CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, SORBETH-30 TETRAOLEATE, POLYETHYLENE, PEG-5 GLYCERYL TRIISOSTEARATE, WATERAQUAEAU, TOCOPHEROL, PHENOXYETHANOL [ILN30654]
book: 2388-Clinique Take the Day Off Cleansing Balm (2020 formulation)

chunk: Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
